content:
the UCSB softball team looks to kick off its season at home this weekend with the  Gaucho Classic PERIOD

Four different teams will be competing in the roundrobin tournament including Cal State Bakersfield Dayton and Texas AM PERIOD

The Gauchos who had an overall record of  and a conference record of  last year will play in four games at Campus Diamond including a double header on Friday PERIOD Their first match will be early Friday morning against Dayton followed by two games with Texas AM one later in the afternoon and one on Saturday PERIOD The Gauchos will wrap up their weekend on Sunday with CSUB PERIOD

With the graduation of its batting average leader Jessica Soria UCSB will look to the only other player to bat over . last year Sophomore infielder Arianna Palomares PERIOD As a freshman Palomares was a huge offensive surge as she reeled in  hits and had an average of . overall ranking her second on the team behind Soria PERIOD

The presence of Palomares last year beautifully complemented the smallball style of play that the Gauchos present by getting on base and creating scoring opportunities for the team PERIOD

Another player who is sure to make some noise for Santa Barbara this weekend is junior pitcher Shelby Wisdom PERIOD Wisdom a former Big West Freshman of the year and All Big West team selection is a doublesided knife for the Gauchos on the diamond with outstanding defense and offense PERIOD

Last year she stood in the circle almost twice as much as any other pitcher with  appearances  of them being starts PERIOD She pitched a total of . innings while no other pitchers reached  innings on the year and recorded an earned run average of . strikeouts and  wins PERIOD

Her defense in the circle is dominating but it is not limited to pitching as the coaching staff is no stranger to sticking the junior in the outfield on days that she doesnt pitch or even after they bring in another pitcher PERIOD This strategy used by head coach Brie Galicinao is without a doubt to keep her on the field for offense PERIOD

Last year Wisdom ranked third on the team in batting average with . and first in RBIs as she drove in  for UCSB PERIOD Her ability to get big hits . sLG  HRs provides a surge for the Gauchos that allows the team to take control of games early and for her to close out the match with her arms PERIOD Anytime a player can superbly provide their own run support they will surely be a threat to any team PERIOD Her BabeRuthlike style has made her very valuable to Santa Barbara PERIOD

Being that this is the opening of the season for the Gauchos look to see an appearance from some of the new additions of the team PERIOD In the offseason UCSB picked up six freshman three outfielders two infielders and a pitcher PERIOD With some proficient and disciplined play by the Gauchos this weekend these younger players will get a chance to put their cleats on NCAA grass for the first time PERIOD

First pitch will be thrown at  a.m PERIOD Friday morning against Dayton at Campus Diamond PERIOD

This article is an online exclusive and did not appear in the print edition of the Daily Nexus PERIOD
